general.description: Ummula is a wealthy residential planet. Its proximity to the Sirius core and the presence of a prestigious military academy within have given it all the economic exposure it could want. Taxes on Ummula are among the highest in Sirius space, so Siriusites who aren't quite wealthy usually can't afford to live here, although some do try.
general.bar: Many spaceport bars play music, but few spaceport bars allow their customers control over it. This one does. A central platform contains a control interface that patrons can use to request specific pieces of music to play in the bar. This being Ummula, customers have to pay a fee to access the controls.
